title: Calories in Wendy's 10 Piece Nuggets
meta_description: Discover calories in Wendy's 10 piece nuggets, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and quick tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Wendy's classic breaded chicken nuggets, fried; based on official nutrition data for a 10-piece serving (approx. 142g total).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; check Wendy's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: Wendy's 10-piece chicken nuggets provide 420 kcal and 24 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in Wendy's 10 piece nuggets?
What's the protein in Wendy's 10 piece nuggets?
faqs.a: About 24 g of protein per 10 pieces.

faqs.q: Do Wendy's nuggets have trans fat?
faqs.a: No trans fat (0 g) in the standard 10-piece nuggets.
